GET_EPCOT_ORDER_DETAILS: select bill_to_name, sales_order_id, order_date, INTERNAL_HEADER_TYPE, COM_COMPANY_NUMBER, order_status_id, original_order_number from ecm.sales_order where ORIGINAL_ORDER_NUMBER =:Original_order_number
GET_ORDER_HEADER: select * from AMFLIBF.MBBWCPP@CORP400 order_history_header where BWCVNB =:Com_order_number and BWAENB =:Com_company_number and BWDCCD =:Internal_header_type
GET_LINE_ITEM: select * from AMFLIBF.MBGGCPP@CORP400 orderlineitem where GGCVNB =:Ggcvnb and GGAENB =:Ggaenb and GGDCCD =:Ggdccd
GET_ORDER_DETAIL: select * from AMFLIBF.MBDRREP@CORP400 where DRCVNB =:Drcvnb and DRAENB =:Draenb and DRDCCD =:Drdccd
GET_SHIPMENT_HEADER: select * from AMFLIBF.MBDHREP@CORP400 where DHCVNB =:Dhcvnb AND DHAENB =:Dhaenb and DHDCCD =:Dhdccd
